verses.text: There is One God. Truth by name, the Creator, devoid of fear and enmity, immortal, unborn, self-existent, great and bountiful.
By the grace of the True Guru, meditate on Him.
He was True in the beginning, He was True when the ages commenced, He has been True from eternity, He is True now, and He will be True in the future.
By thinking, He cannot be reduced to thought, even by thinking hundreds of thousands of times.
